title: how much daysss
body: I haved a 14 day bann and when this bann ends i cant get thinks life keys and chest I dont know why when game end I see a text in chat who says i cant get thinks from games and i dont know how much days is this or can this be permanent ?

replies.body:
There's no set amount of time before you become eligible for loot again. Essentially you need to exhibit a trend of positive growth and attitude in-game to begin earning loot again for matches. I definitely recommend checking out our [Loot Restriction FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) for complete details on how this works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
ok tyyyy so much I see

Everything you need to know is an a FAQ:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions
